channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [AMQ-8097] Harden deserialization block xstream ack processing
item.description:
Since we improve serialization security (see AMQ-7438), when a message has to be loaded from store and the message is xstream serialized, it fails with:

2020-12-04 16:42:26,107 | WARN  | / | org.eclipse.jetty.server.HttpChannel | qtp1987354705-137568
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException:

class               : [Ljava.lang.StackTraceElement;
required-type       : [Ljava.lang.StackTraceElement;
converter-type      : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.ArrayConverter

line number         : 28

version             : 1.4.11.1

item.summary: Harden deserialization block xstream ack processing

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: We also have to update AMQ-7399 allowing back java.lang to deserialize exception stack trace.

To fix the issue I think we should:

  • Add "java.lang" (not java.util) back to ClassLoadingAwareObjectInputStream
  • Take  SubSelectorClassObjectInputStream out of MessageDatabaseObjectInputStream, and re-use it in SubQueueSelectorCacheBroker.
  • Also add the xstream namespace to SubSelectorClassObjectInputStream
